matrix.db
Class ExpansionWithSelect

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.ExpansionWithSelect
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ExpansionWithSelect
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The ExpansionWithSelect provides functionality for expand all and structures with select data.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Summary
 RelationshipWithSelectList getRelationships()
          Get the relationships for the expansion
 BusinessObject getRoot()
          Get the root of the expansion
 java.util.Hashtable getRootData()
          Deprecated. as of ADK 10.0: The keys for a Hashtable must each be unique within that Hashtable. The keys returned by certain complex select clauses from eMatrix are not guaranteed to be unique. Therefore the packing of a list of fully-realized select clauses and their corresponding values may result in a LOSS of data. If any of the keys is repeated, the last value loaded into the Hashtable wins. Replace with getSelectKeys(), getSelectValues(), getSelectTypes() to get independent synchronized vectors of keys, values, and datatypes
 java.lang.String getRootSelectData(java.lang.String key)
          Get a root data value

getRootData

public java.util.Hashtable getRootData()
Deprecated. as of ADK 10.0: The keys for a Hashtable must each be unique within that Hashtable. The keys returned by certain complex select clauses from eMatrix are not guaranteed to be unique. Therefore the packing of a list of fully-realized select clauses and their corresponding values may result in a LOSS of data. If any of the keys is repeated, the last value loaded into the Hashtable wins. Replace with getSelectKeys(), getSelectValues(), getSelectTypes() to get independent synchronized vectors of keys, values, and datatypes

Get the select data for the root of the expansion
Returns:
Hashtable that is the data for the root of the expansion
Since:
ADK 9.0.0
